\hypertarget{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_sheet_base}{}\doxysection{Open\+XLSX\+::XLSheet\+Base\texorpdfstring{$<$}{<} T, \texorpdfstring{$>$}{>} Class Template Reference}
\label{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_sheet_base}\index{OpenXLSX::XLSheetBase$<$ T, $>$@{OpenXLSX::XLSheetBase$<$ T, $>$}}


The \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_sheet_base}{XLSheet\+Base}} class is the base class for the \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_worksheet}{XLWorksheet}} and \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_chartsheet}{XLChartsheet}} classes. However, it is not a base class in the traditional sense. Rather, it provides common functionality that is inherited via the CRTP (Curiously Recurring Template Pattern) pattern.  




{\ttfamily \#include $<$XLSheet.\+hpp$>$}

\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
\subsubsection*{template$<$typename T, typename std\+::enable\+\_\+if$<$ std\+::is\+\_\+same\+\_\+v$<$ T, \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_worksheet}{XLWorksheet}} $>$$\vert$$\vert$std\+::is\+\_\+same\+\_\+v$<$ T, \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_chartsheet}{XLChartsheet}} $>$ $>$\+::type $\ast$ = nullptr$>$\newline
class Open\+XLSX\+::\+XLSheet\+Base$<$ T, $>$}
The \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_sheet_base}{XLSheet\+Base}} class is the base class for the \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_worksheet}{XLWorksheet}} and \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_chartsheet}{XLChartsheet}} classes. However, it is not a base class in the traditional sense. Rather, it provides common functionality that is inherited via the CRTP (Curiously Recurring Template Pattern) pattern. 


\begin{DoxyTemplParams}{Template Parameters}
{\em T} & Type that will inherit functionality. Restricted to types \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_worksheet}{XLWorksheet}} and \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_chartsheet}{XLChartsheet}}. \\
\hline
\end{DoxyTemplParams}
Inheritance diagram for Open\+XLSX\+::XLSheet\+Base\texorpdfstring{$<$}{<} T, \texorpdfstring{$>$}{>}\+:\begin{figure}[H]
\begin{center}
\leavevmode
\includegraphics[height=2.000000cm]{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_sheet_base}
\end{center}
\end{figure}

{\footnotesize\ttfamily template$<$typename T , typename std\+::enable\+\_\+if$<$ std\+::is\+\_\+same\+\_\+v$<$ T, \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_worksheet}{XLWorksheet}} $>$$\vert$$\vert$std\+::is\+\_\+same\+\_\+v$<$ T, \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_chartsheet}{XLChartsheet}} $>$ $>$\+::type $\ast$  = nullptr$>$ \\
\mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_sheet_base}{Open\+XLSX\+::\+XLSheet\+Base}}$<$ T, $>$\+::\+XLSheet\+Base (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}\item[{\mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_xml_data}{XLXml\+Data}} $\ast$}]{xml\+Data }\end{DoxyParamCaption})\hspace{0.3cm}{\ttfamily [inline]}, {\ttfamily [explicit]}}



The constructor. There are no default constructor, so all parameters must be provided for constructing an XLAbstract\+Sheet object. Since this is a pure abstract class, instantiation is only possible via one of the derived classes.
